text: "Tragedy" is a song from 1979. It was written by Barry, Robin and Maurice Gibb. It was performed by the Bee Gees. The band released as a single from their 15th studio album Spirits Having Flown and went to number 1 in Canada, France, Ireland, Italy, New Zealand, Spain, the United Kingdom and the United States. ==Steps version== "Tragedy" was covered by English pop group Steps and was issued as an A-side to Heartbeat. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom and New Zealand, number 2 in Ireland, number 4 in Sweden and number 10 in Australia and Greece. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Bee Gees songs Category:Steps songs Category:Foo Fighters songs
